inject: An adversary-aligned outlet publishes a 'leaked memo' claiming several NATO allies are privately reconsidering their participation due to costs.

filter.intro: Division narrative. Adversary trying to create doubt within alliance. This is strategic, not tactical.
filter.outro: Counter-narrative strongest here - show allied unity with joint statements. Fact-checking the fake memo works but feels reactive. Pre-bunking helps if you warned about division tactics. Discrediting outlet is moderate risk - some audiences already distrust them. Ignoring lets suspicion fester.

metadata.teachingPoint: Unity narratives counter division tactics more effectively than debunking alone
